title: Titanium Chainsaw
summaries: The Titanium Chainsaw is a Hardmode chainsaw that is obtainable after crafting an Adamantite Forge or Titanium Forge, and is the chainsaw alternative to the Titanium Waraxe. It is the slightly stronger counterpart to the Adamantite Chainsaw, and is stronger than both the Mythril and Orichalcum Chainsaws, making it the strongest that can be obtained before defeating a Mechanical Boss. Like all Axes and Chainsaws, it is used to cut down Trees, Cacti, and Giant Glowing Mushrooms.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Sell: 252
